body_html:
multiple processes are running a CPU model forward+backward, correct? No GPU involved?
And you are setting OMP_NUM_THREADS=1 and MKL_NUM_THREADS=1 ?
(i ask because multithreaded backward is only invoked if we have GPUs)

body:
multiple processes are running a CPU model forward+backward, correct? No GPU involved? 
And you are setting OMP_NUM_THREADS=1 and MKL_NUM_THREADS=1 ?
(i ask because multithreaded backward is only invoked if we have GPUs)
